articles.description: Not much has changed from the Apple MacBook Air M2 to the M3. It’s faster and can drive two displays with the lid closed, but the MacBook lineup is more convoluted than ever.
articles.content:
The 13-inch and 15-inch Air are better than ever, but Apple needs to do something about the upgrade funnel.
ByJoanna Nelius, laptop reviewer. She has covered consumer technology, with an emphasis on… [+10975 chars]
